name: My Talking Unicorn Emily
summary:
Do you like to dress up? More clothes, more fun. Play talking unicorn games with a cute little virtual pony in this virtual pet and dress up game for kids! Dress up your unicorn in adorable costumes!
Then, while playing a talking unicorn game make sure the unicorn Emily is not hungry. Feed your unicorn pet with yummy foods: fruits, veggies, candies and snacks! And don’t forget to drink energy potion - don't waste time sleeping!
Your unicorn Emily likes to be super clean! Bathe her and enjoy unicorn funny reactions!
Play unicorn games with your talking unicorn Emily! Play coloring and decoration games with your virtual unicorn! Mini games bring coins and fun! Take good care of your magical pony pet and unlock new mini games every day!
Have fun playing My Talking Unicorn Emily!
